org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.simple

Class DefaultSocketTransportConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.simple.DefaultSocketTransportConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransportConnection

    public class DefaultSocketTransportConnection
extends Object
implements TransportConnection
    Transport connection with an underlying Socket.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  DefaultSocketTransportConnection.Receive
      Runnable which handles the transport phase with a remote peer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultSocketTransportConnection

        public DefaultSocketTransportConnection(boolean selfInitiated,
                                TransportAttributes attributes,
                                SocketWrapper socketWrapper,
                                Negotiator negotiator,
                                Authenticator authenticator,
                                Receiver receiver,
                                ExecutorService runner)
        Creates a SocketTransportConnection with corresponding transport attributes and a wrapped socket.
        Parameters:
        selfInitiated - true if connection was initiated by this side and false if not
        attributes - the transport connection attributes
        socketWrapper - the wrapped socket
        negotiator - the version negotiator for version negotiation phase
        authenticator - the authenticator for authentication phase
        receiver - the message receiver for transport phase
        runner - the executor to run the receiver in transport phase

        public boolean isOpen()
        Description copied from interface: TransportConnection
        Checks if the connection is open.
        Specified by:
        isOpen in interface TransportConnection
        Returns:
        true if connection is open and data can be written/read, false if connection is closed.

      • bootstrap

        public void bootstrap()
               throws ConnectionException
        Description copied from interface: TransportConnection
        Initializes the connection and executes negotiation of connection parameters with peer. This processes needs time. It should be considered to call this method using a thread.
        Specified by:
        bootstrap in interface TransportConnection
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if bootstrap fails

      • activate

        public void activate(TransportListener tnccsMessageListener)
              throws ConnectionException
        Description copied from interface: TransportConnection
        Activates the assessment flow and registers a listener for incoming data. The TransportConnection.bootstrap() method should be called first. Implementation may check for a proper call to this method and react accordingly.
        Specified by:
        activate in interface TransportConnection
        Parameters:
        tnccsMessageListener - the listener for incoming data
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if open fails

        Description copied from interface: TransportConnection

        Parameters:

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: TransportConnection
        Closes the connection. No further data can be send. Connection cannot be reopened.
        Specified by:
        close in interface TransportConnection
